infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshelldepletedfu: It is more powerful than steel shells, has stronger armor piercing ability, and can cause radiation damage to the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellaphep: A railgun armor-piercing projectile. Able to penetrate the ship's hull and detonate, equipped with a proximity fuze.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellapfsds: A reloadable railgun shell. Fires a high-speed steel dart that penetrate the ship's hull and armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellacid: An experimental railgun shell. It is filled with special acid, which can be sprayed near the projectile after launch.This controversial weapon has been repeatedly proposed for ban by animal protection societies.
infotexts.entitydescription.railguncanistershellex: A reloadable railgun shell. Loaded with explosive pellets.
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxexplosi: Ammo for chaingun. Explodes on hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxspread: Burst ammo for chaingun. Effective against unarmored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxstun: Ammunition for the coilgun. Explodes and stuns targets on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.flakcannonshockammobox: A heavy box of wide-spread electric shock ammo for the Flak Cannon. Good against swarms.
